name: Chompy Chomp Chomp Party
description:
FRANTIC FUN FOR ALL YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY

GAME SUMMARY

Invite your friends and family to join you for a Chompy Chomp Chomp Party. A chaotic and fun local multiplayer game for up to 8 players that will bring joyful memories, laughter and connection.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER & REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER

Chompy Chomp Chomp Party allows 1 to 8 players to play locally on the same screen or from a far with Remote Play Together.

GAME MODES AND OPTIONS

With 6 game modes as default and more purchasable via DLC. Play the game however you want, and tailor it to who you are playing with. Customisable down to the finest detail, a variety of novel and exciting game modes with infinite levels, so no two games are ever the same.

LEVELS & LEVEL GENERATOR

There is now no end to the level layouts you can play with and several themes to keep the colourful chaos going.

EVERYTHING PLAYABLE

We do not hide any game content. You do not have to "earn" it in game. You can play all of the content that you have purchased right away.

DEAR PLAYERS


Parents/Grown-ups:
We know lots of parents looking to connect with their kids over games, rather than sit on separate screens. We designed this primarily for families to play together, and we it play a lot with our kids.

It is important to us that our players are treated ethically. All of our games are made according to our Ethical Games Manifesto, which you can find out more about on our website.

Kids:
Why not invite your friends or family round for a Chompy Chomp Chomp Party? You can have Chompy Cakes or Chompy hats if it's a special day, or just do it any day!

For Friendship Groups:
Starved of things to invite your friends over for? Have a games night! Play Chompy Chomp Chomp Party, you are guaranteed laughs and chaos.
